item.title: Emirates provides appealing packages for stopovers in Dubai
item.description:
Source: Emirates. Dubai’s skyline, featuring the Burj Khalifa on the right. Travelers flying with Emirates can benefit from appealing Dubai packages. These packages offer special prices at top-rated hotels and include access to entertainment options like city shows and attractions*. Starting from US$49 per night, based on double occupancy, visitors can experience Dubai at the Rove Dubai Marina, located in the city’s vibrant waterfront area. This package also includes two tickets to Dubai Parks and Resorts, the region’s most extensive integrated theme park destination, encompassing MOTIONGATE Dubai, BOLLYWOOD PARKS Dubai, LEGOLAND Dubai, and LEGOLAND Water Park...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-provides-appealing-packages-for-stopovers-in-dubai/

item.title: DEAL.com.sg is celebrating its upcoming birthday by giving away S$5 million to customers
item.description:
The flash sale website, DEAL.com.sg, is thanking its loyal customers by offering them millions of dollars in discounts. This initiative, launched after the company’s start in May 2010, also aims to draw in new customers. Patrick Linden, the CEO of DEAL.com.sg’s parent company, iBuy Group, expressed his gratitude, stating that the company is giving back $5 million to thank customers for their support over the past three and a half years...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/deal-com-sg-is-celebrating-its-upcoming-birthday-by-giving-away-s-5-million-to-customers/
